Package casino.cashier

Interface ICashier

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cashier
public interface ICashier

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addAmount​(IGamblerCard card, MoneyAmount amount)
    add amount to the players card.
    boolean checkIfBetIsValid​(IGamblerCard card, Bet betToCheck)
    check if Bet made with the playercard is possible.
    IGamblerCard distributeGamblerCard()
    Cards are distributed by a Cashier to a gambler bankteller keeps track of which cards are handed out.

    When handing in the card at a Bank teller, all betID’s on it are logged.

  • Method Details

    • distributeGamblerCard

      IGamblerCard distributeGamblerCard()
      Cards are distributed by a Cashier to a gambler bankteller keeps track of which cards are handed out. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Returns:

    • returnGamblerCard

      void returnGamblerCard​(IGamblerCard card)
      When handing in the card at a Bank teller, all betID’s on it are logged. The total amount of money credit is physically handed to the gambler, and the amount stored on the card is changed to zero. The stored betID’s on the card are also removed. Note: also use the appropiate required methods from the gambling authority API
      Parameters:
      card -

    • checkIfBetIsValid

      boolean checkIfBetIsValid​(IGamblerCard card, Bet betToCheck) throws BetNotAcceptedException
      check if Bet made with the playercard is possible. this is based on the amount related to the card, and the amount made in the bet. if the bet is valid, the amount of the bet is subtracted from the amount belonging to the card.
      Parameters:
      card -
      betToCheck -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      BetNotAcceptedException - if bet amount is invalid

    • addAmount

      void addAmount​(IGamblerCard card, MoneyAmount amount) throws InvalidAmountException
      add amount to the players card.
      Parameters:
      card - card to add amount to
      amount - amount to add to card
      Throws:
      InvalidAmountException - when MoneyAmount contains a negative value or is null
